mapper.sql: id, path, name, suffix, create_time, document_type, user_id, app_id
mapper.insert: insert into document (path, name, suffix, create_time, document_type, user_id, app_id) values (#{path}, #{name}, #{suffix}, #{createTime}, #{documentType}, #{userId}, #{appId})
mapper.delete: delete from document where user_id = #{userId} and app_id = #{appId} and document_type = #{documentType}
